statements: SELECT * FROM payment_cards;
SELECT card_id, card_number, expiry_date FROM payment_cards WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT DISTINCT card_holder_name FROM payment_cards;
SELECT * FROM payment_cards ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT card_number, cvv FROM payment_cards WHERE card_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM payment_cards WHERE card_holder_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY card_id DESC
SELECT card_number, card_holder_name FROM payment_cards WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY card_id ASC
SELECT card_holder_name, cvv FROM payment_cards WHERE card_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY cvv DESC
SELECT card_id, card_holder_name, expiry_date FROM payment_cards WHERE cvv < 500 ORDER BY expiry_date ASC
SELECT * FROM payment_cards WHERE card_number LIKE '123%' ORDER BY card_id ASC
SELECT * FROM payment_cards;
SELECT card_id, card_number, cardholder_name, expiration_date FROM payment_cards;
SELECT cardholder_name, card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_cards WHERE card_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_cards;
SELECT cardholder_name, expiration_date FROM payment_cards WHERE card_id = 10;
SELECT cardholder_name, card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_cards WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT card_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY card_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_cards LIMIT 10;
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number FROM payment_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_cards ORDER BY card_holder_name DESC, expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_cards WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe' AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_cards WHERE card_id IN (SELECT card_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100.00);
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date, cvv FROM payment_cards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT users.username, payment_cards.card_number FROM users INNER JOIN payment_cards ON users.user_id = payment_cards.card_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM card_details;
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM card_details WHERE card_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT street_address, city, state, zipcode FROM address WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transaction WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT card_number, card_holder_name, expiration_date, cvv FROM card_details WHERE card_id = 4;
SELECT customer_name, street_address, city, state, zipcode FROM customer JOIN address ON customer.customer_id = address.customer_id WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM cards;
SELECT card_number, card_holder_name, expiry_date FROM cards WHERE cvv = 123;
SELECT card_number, card_holder_name FROM cards ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM cards LIMIT 5;
SELECT card_holder_name, card_number FROM cards WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.username, addresses.city FROM users INNER JOIN addresses ON users.user_id = addresses.user_id WHERE addresses.zip_code = '10001';
SELECT card_holder_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cards INNER JOIN payments ON cards.card_id = payments.card_id GROUP BY card_holder_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
